section.name: Sales tax (VAT, GST) due on a transaction on an item basis VS an invoice basis.

p.b: Keywords: Sales tax (VAT, GST) due on a transaction on an item basis VS an invoice basis.

section.p: By default Beigesoft™ EIS uses the "item basis" method. You can switch it in the "Accounting settings" and a "Tax destination".
